thread.title: Mets' NLDS Game 4 lineup: Who is going to send the Los Angeles Dodgers home for good?
thread.title_full: Mets' NLDS Game 4 lineup: Who is going to send the Los Angeles Dodgers home for good?

author: Mike Vorkunov | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Mets' NLDS Game 4 lineup: Who is going to send the Los Angeles Dodgers home for good?
text:
NEW YORK -- The Mets ' lineup worked so well Monday night, they thought, why change it up? They'll have the same one Tuesday for Game 4 of the National League Division Series against the Dodgers. 
There's one big difference though. They will be facing Clayton Kershaw , not Brett Anderson, and that's a big deal. So if the Mets want to end this NLDS in four games, they'll have to beat him for a second time in four games. 
No easy feat, obviously. The Mets will throw Steven Matz on the mound. It will be his first start since Sept. 24 because of a back injury. 
METS
